channel.title: Help needed - Recoloring -
channel.description:
Hey! I'm working on a new private server, and i thought of starting to recolor. As i actually have been coding 7 hours a day the last 10 days :D now, i don't seem to find tutorials in recoloring?(Maybe cuz its to easy?) Anyways, could any1 help me? and if i have a whip recolor code in the class8.java, do i have to add new whip model? (example)
-MrPurple

item.description:
@MrPurple wrote:

Ah, dissapointment…
No help to get
BtW, Nick. I posted in ur topic bout the slots
